entries.title: Tech Layoffs Reflect Growing Frustration With Social Media, Industry Analysts Say
entries.description: The logo of Meta displayed on a booth ahead of the World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting in Davos, Switzerland, on May 22, 2022. (Fabrice Coffrini/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Virtual Reality Headsets Igniting Safety Concerns Over Radiation Levels
entries.description: Daniel Beauchamp, head of Shopify’s virtual reality team, at the company’s offices in Ottawa on March 27, 2018. Shopify owns fewer than 10 patents but is Canada’s largest tech success story. (Sean Kilpatrick/The Canadian Press)

entries.title: Gmail Creator Warns ChatGPT Challenges Google’s Search Engine Dominance
entries.description: Screens displaying the logos of OpenAI and ChatGPT in Toulouse, southwestern France,   on Jan. 23, 2023. (Lionel Bonaventure/AFP via Getty Images)
